last_episode_to_air.name: Argentina and Chile
last_episode_to_air.overview: Where do the Andes start? Where do they end? There is no precise answer, but in Punta Arenas, Chile, they continue their journey underwater.

episodes.name: Argentina and Chile, from the southern ice
episodes.overview: It all starts in Tierra del Fuego, the southernmost point on Earth located in Argentina, and continues in the stunning Torres del Paine Park in Chile.

episodes.name: Chile and Argentina, from the Aconcagua to the desert
episodes.overview: The Andes stretch through Mendoza and into the Atacama Desert, a place that might hold some answers to the lingering questions of humankind's origin.

episodes.name: Bolivia, the door to the Altiplano
episodes.overview: Welcome to Bolivia, home of the Salar de Uyuni, Earth's largest salt flat, and La Paz, where an aerial tram gives intimate views of the Andean Plateau.

episodes.name: Peru, an ancient culture
episodes.overview: With its vast cities coexisting with symbols of the Inca Empire like Machu Picchu, Peru holds a strong link between ancient traditions and modernity.

episodes.name: Peru and Ecuador. Climbing the Cotopaxi Volcano
episodes.overview: In Ecuador, adventurers try to conquer the active volcano Cotopaxi, while risky winding roads link towns anchored in the mountains to bigger cities.

episodes.name: Colombia: Mountains and Lush Vegetation
episodes.overview: The 8,500-kilometer journey through the Andes comes to an end in Colombia, where lively cities like Cali, Medellín and Bogotá nestle in the mountains.

episodes.name: Venezuela and Colombia
episodes.overview: A father-and-son duo tackles the imposing Bolívar Peak in Venezuela, while beekeepers in Colombia work to preserve the Andean flora sustainably.

episodes.name: Peru and Ecuador
episodes.overview: From the culinary scene of Cuenca, Ecuador, to the kitesurfing spots in Gallito Ciego, Perú, life in the Andes is as rich and varied as its landscapes.

episodes.name: La Rioja Argentina, an Oasis in Peru and Bolivia
episodes.overview: The tour continues with a trip to La Rioja in Argentina, a visit to a Bolivian town frozen in time and a glimpse of an oasis in the Peruvian desert.

episodes.name: Argentina and Chile
episodes.overview: Where do the Andes start? Where do they end? There is no precise answer, but in Punta Arenas, Chile, they continue their journey underwater.
